data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Dong, Zhang, Zhi-Qiang (2013): The genus Notophthiracarus of New Zealand (Acari: Oribatida: Phthiracaridae): three new species and a key to 24 described species. Zootaxa 3682 (2): 392-400, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3682.2.11
